answers.answer: Hi there. I am sorry to apprise you that  Friedreich’s ataxia  has no effective treatment currently. However many of the symptoms and complications can be treated to prolong optimal functioning of patients. Diabetes and heart problems can be treated with medications like ACE inhibitors and digoxin. Sometimes a metal rod is inserted in the spine to prevent progression of scoliosis. Assisted devices like cane, walker or wheelchair are required for independence. Standing frames reduce secondary complications of prolonged wheel chair use.I hope this information helps. Take care.

question: I have F.ATAXIA.can u    suggest any treatmentHarish Pandey
title: ATAXIA
